content: I just finished reading a novel about old Hollywood and the glamour of the past, and I'm in the mood for something a bit different. Speaking of which, I just finished "The Seven Husbands of Evelyn Hugo" last week, and I loved it so much that I added all of Taylor Jenkins Reid's other books to my to-read list. Do you have any more recommendations for books that have a similar vibe or focus on the entertainment industry?
